title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.10 - Unlicensed activity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.10 - Unlicensed activity

State Regulations
(a) Except as provided for in section
80.5
of this Part, no person shall act as a manufacturer, distributor, importer or exporter of controlled substances in this State without first having obtained a license from the department. (b) Holders of licenses in such categories shall register with the appropriate Federal agency or agencies in the comparable controlled substances schedules and license class provided for under Federal regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
80.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
